Add dawgntheboys

The only real thing a support main can do is Duo with a "not useless" ADC.
The best thing for a Support is to reliable know how your laning partner will play. Makes everything a lot easier.

Have you tried rewatching your own games? Its amazing at how many mistakes you can pick up on your own just by going back and rewatching what happened. You can download "League Summoner Info" which records your games or simply use Replay.gg.

Some tips: Don't go Thunderlords on Soraka. If you want to carry in low elo, play a champion that can carry. Healers like Soraka are cool if your team is good and you can rely on them, otherwise supports like Brand/Bard/Braum/Leona etc are much more effective. Tanky Playmakers or Supports that do ridiculous damage.

Get proper Runes. Yours are kind of garbage.
